titles.title: A bill to amend section 9006 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for funding of the Federal Election Commission from amounts designated for the Presidential Election Campaign Fund under section 6096 of such Code.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: 8/10/1988--Introduced. Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide funding of the Federal Election Commission from amounts in the Presidential Election Campaign Fund.
